description: This adapter serves as the mounting point for Bravo-compatible suppressors from SilencerCo.  In particular, it can be used to mount SilencerCo Hybrid 46.  It confers no other benefits.

notes: length eyeballed to be 1.5 × minimum thread length for 1/2 in. × 28-threaded barrel
minimum thread length for this kind of a thread is said to be between 0.6 in. and 0.625 in.
for AR-15-style rifles, usually using 5.56mm/.223 rounds, the length is said to be 0.625 in.
we're using 0.625 in. as the length of thread

//integral_longest_side: length of mount (0.9375 in. ≈ 24 mm) - length of thread (0.625 in. ≈ 16 mm) = 7.9375 mm ≈ 8 mm
